import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');// Check for hardcoded admin credentials
if(email==='Admin@reuse.com'&&password==='(Dm)36921'){localStorage.setItem('token','admin-token');window.dispatchEvent(new Event('storage'));// Trigger re-check
console.log('Navigating to Analysis...');navigate('/analysis');return;}//for local server fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/login',
try{const response=await fetch('/api/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await response.json();console.log('Server response:',data);if(!response.ok){throw new Error(data.message||'Login failed');}localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);localStorage.setItem('currentUser',JSON.stringify(data.user));// ✅ CORRECT
window.dispatchEvent(new Event('storage'));// Trigger re-check
console.log('Navigating to dashboard...');navigate('/dashboard');}catch(err){console.error('Login error:',err.message);setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Sign Up"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/forgot-password",children:"Forgot Password?"})})]});}export default Login;
